QBASIC Programming.text: Debug the following program. [3] REM to print 5 records from data file HOSPITAL.TXT​ OPEN "HOSPITAL.TXT" FOR APPEND AS #5​ FOR REP = 1 TO 5​ INPUT #3, PN$,AD$,G$,A​ DISPLAY PN$,AD$,A, G$​ NEXT REP​ FINISH #5​ END
